page.title: 12Events
page.content:
Although the Gala is the event of the year there are a great number of oher times when the villagers can get together e.g. Musical plays at the schools; various productions at the { {Yaxley}Amateur Players ranging from one act plays to live Punch and Judy; Band concerts put on by the British legion;a number of Barn dances and Discos for all ages; Autumn Fayre, Garden Fetes, Fun Runs etc.
These are a brief summary of the activities that happen during the course of a very eventfull year in { {Yaxley. }
